summary: Three Irish Catholic brothers from Long Island struggle to deal with love, marriage, and infidelity.
cast: Shari Albert|Maxine Bahns|Catharine Bolz|Connie Britton|Edward Burns|Peter Johansen|Jennifer Jostyn|Michael McGlone|Elizabeth McKay|Jack Mulcahy
keywords: irish catholic|long island|low budget film|loss of father|abusive father
title: Los hermanos McMullen
